item.description:
Deal or No Deal$ Workshop (Free, Members Only event)
Wednesday, February 24th. 6:30 - 9:00pm
Comfort Inn. 900 East Main St. Meriden, CT
Reserve Your Spot Today at: www.ctreia.com/events.php

So you think that you found a great deal? Think Again... and learn the process!

Our panel of seasoned investors will help you analyze and structure your deals so that you avoid the bad deals and make the profitable deals happen!

Our panel of experts have 50+ years of buying and selling single family houses and apartment buildings.

1. Find out what works and doesn’t work!
2. Sometimes what appears to be a great deal…. Is Really a questionable deal???
3. Learn how to walk away gracefully! (so that you don’t lose your shirt)
4. Learn how to turn your deal$ into ca$h.
5. Is your marketing Working or Not?
6. Pull your leads out of the Trash Can… and let’s turn them into a deal$!

If you know the rules... you'll avoid the pitfalls...
JoAnne Brissette (CT REIA Head Coach)

Be sure to bring your deals to this event! We have put together a panel of seasoned real estate investors who will help you evaluate your deals and hopefully turn it into cash!

group.name: CT REIA - The Connecticut Real Estate Investors Assn. Meetup

item.name: Deal Or No Deal Workshop (Free Members Only Event)
